definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
lit. it's the soft persimmons that people choose to squeeze (idiom)/fig. it's the weak (i.e. 軟柿子|软柿子[ruan3 shi4 zi5]) who get picked on/bullies pick soft targets
pinyin: shi4 zi5 tiao1 ruan3 de5 nie1

sentences.english: Yellow bell peppers add color and flavor to any recipe.
sentences.chinese: 黃柿子椒添加顏色和味道的任何配方。

sentences.english: No one should eat more than three at a time because they contain so much 'cold' energy.
sentences.chinese: 柿子性寒，每次食用不要超過三個爲宜。

sentences.english: Study on fermented Rosa laevigata Michx and Pyracantha fortuneana health vinegar beverage;
sentences.chinese: 對柿子醋酸飲料的發酵工藝進行了研究。

sentences.english: Eating it often can relieve patches of pigmentation.
sentences.chinese: 經常食用柿子還可以減少色素沉澱。

sentences.english: Your job is to do your job, not to be a pushover.
sentences.chinese: 工作就是工作，別做一隻任人捏的軟柿子。

sentences.english: Persimmon cake, vegetable soup, cold noodles, etc.
sentences.chinese: 柿子餅，芙蓉湯，涼皮什麼的。

sentences.english: I got the persimmon cuttings from a neighbor.
Watership auspicious festive magpie and form full of persimmon.
sentences.chinese: 取材於吉祥喜慶的喜鵲和形態飽滿的柿子。

sentences.english: I’m eating watermelon, melon, mango and persimmons. I just want to have $200.
sentences.chinese: 我在喫西瓜，甜瓜，芒果和柿子。

sentences.english: Pick the green persimmons from the tree top.
Anthocyanins provide the dark colours of many fruits and vegetables, such as blueberries and red peppers.
sentences.chinese: 花青素使很多水果和蔬菜呈深色，如藍莓和紅柿子椒。

sentences.english: At the very top of the old persimmon tree, there was one last fruit.
sentences.chinese: 那棵樹的頂梢梢上，還掛着一個小火柿子。

sentences.english: Please put some extra bell pepper on my pizza.
sentences.chinese: 在我的比薩上多加點柿子椒。

sentences.english: Unlike apples, fresh persimmon is not available year round.
sentences.chinese: 柿子不像蘋果，一年四季可以喫得到。

sentences.english: Persimmon fruit is not only delicious, and nutritious.
sentences.chinese: 柿子不僅味道鮮美，而且營養豐富。

sentences.english: Persimmon fruit wine was produced by single yeast strain solid fermentation with sweet persimmon as raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 以甜柿爲原料，採用酵母菌固態發酵法生產柿子果酒。

definition: blue or green jujube/Chinese green date
